          <title>
            <string language="sl">Električni potencial in naelektreni krogli</string>
            <string language="en">Electric Potential of Charged Spheres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrisches Potential der belasteten Bereiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Potentiel électrique des sphères chargées</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Potencial elétrico de esferas carregadas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Potenziale elettrico delle sfere caricate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρική δυνατότητα των χρεωμένων σφαιρών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Potencial eléctrico de esferas cargadas</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Razporeditev potenciala okrog dveh točkastih nabojev, če en spreminja naboj.</string>
            <string language="en">Distribution of potential in surroundings of two point charges when one of them is changing.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električni potencial</string>
            <string language="en">electric potential</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električni naboj</string>
            <string language="en">electric charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">krogla</string>
            <string language="en">sphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verteilung des Potentials in den Umlagerungen von 
zwei Punktladungen, wenn eine von ihnen ändert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Distribution de potentiel dans les environnements 
de deux frais de point quand l'un d'entre eux change.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Distribuição do potencial nos arredors de duas 
cargas do ponto quando um delas mudar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Distribuzione di potenziale nei dintorni di due 
spese del punto quando una di loro sta cambiando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η διανομή της δυνατότητας στα περίχωρα δύο δείχνει 
τις δαπάνες όταν αλλάζει μια από τις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Distribución del potencial en alrededores de dos 
cargas de la punta cuando una de ellas está cambiando.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisches Potential</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Ladung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bereich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">potentiel électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
